named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTaskVariable.readAll
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessTaskVariable( variable.id,variable.name,variable.value ) FROM TaskVariableImpl variable

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTaskVariable.readByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessTaskVariable( variable.id,variable.name,variable.value ) FROM TaskVariableImpl variable WHERE variable.processId = :processId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTaskVariable.readByProcessInstanceId
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessTaskVariable( variable.id,variable.name,variable.value ) FROM TaskVariableImpl variable WHERE variable.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTaskVariable.countByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(variable) FROM TaskVariableImpl variable WHERE variable.processId = :processId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessTaskVariable.countByProcessInstanceId
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(variable) FROM TaskVariableImpl variable WHERE variable.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId
